text: (Who doeth greater wrong) who is more insolent and daring (than he who inventeth a lie concerning Allah? Such will be brought before their Lord) they will be dragged to their Lord, (and the witnesses) the angels and the prophets (will say: These) the disbelievers (are they who lied concerning their Lord. Now the curse of Allah) the chastisement of Allah (is upon wrong-doers) upon the idolaters,
